statements: SELECT * FROM face_recognition;
SELECT full_name, age, gender FROM face_recognition WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM face_recognition WHERE known_face = TRUE;
SELECT face_id, full_name FROM face_recognition ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT full_name, gender FROM face_recognition WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM face_recognition WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT face_id, full_name, age FROM face_recognition WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT full_name, gender FROM face_recognition WHERE known_face = true LIMIT 5;
SELECT age, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM face_recognition GROUP BY age HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT full_name, photo_url FROM face_recognition WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 AND known_face = true ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM persons_of_interest ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM persons_of_interest WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, name FROM persons_of_interest ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM known_faces;
SELECT id FROM persons_of_interest WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM persons_of_interest WHERE age IN (20, 30, 40) ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM persons_of_interest WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM persons_of_interest WHERE name LIKE 'J%' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM persons_of_interest p JOIN known_faces f ON p.face_encoding = f.face_encoding;
SELECT name, age FROM persons_of_interest WHERE id = 1 OR id = 3 OR id = 5;
SELECT * FROM persons_of_interest;
SELECT person_id, name FROM persons_of_interest WHERE person_id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM persons_of_interest WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM known_faces ORDER BY person_id DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM persons_of_interest WHERE person_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM persons_of_interest INNER JOIN known_faces ON persons_of_interest.person_id = known_faces.person_id
SELECT name, description FROM persons_of_interest WHERE person_id = 1
SELECT * FROM persons_of_interest WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY person_id DESC
SELECT MAX(person_id) AS max_id FROM persons_of_interest
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_persons FROM persons_of_interest
SELECT * FROM Person;
SELECT name, occupation FROM Person WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name FROM Person WHERE occupation = 'Engineer';
SELECT id, name, age FROM Person ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, name, COUNT(*) FROM KnownFaces GROUP BY id, name;
SELECT name, age FROM Person WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT p.name, k.image_url FROM Person p JOIN KnownFaces k ON p.name = k.name;
SELECT p.name, COUNT(fr.id) AS recognition_count FROM Person p LEFT JOIN FaceRecognitionResults fr ON p.id = fr.person_id GROUP BY p.name;
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age, MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM Person;
SELECT name, occupation, COUNT(ff.face_id) AS face_count FROM Person LEFT JOIN FaceFeatures ff ON p.id = ff.face_id GROUP BY name, occupation;
SELECT * FROM Persons;
SELECT person_name, person_age FROM Persons ORDER BY person_age DESC;
SELECT person_name, person_gender FROM Persons WHERE person_age > 30;
SELECT person_id, person_name FROM Persons WHERE person_gender = 'Male';
SELECT person_name, person_age, person_gender FROM Persons WHERE person_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM Persons WHERE person_age > 30 ORDER BY person_name DESC;
SELECT person_name, person_age, person_gender FROM Persons WHERE person_gender = 'Male';
SELECT p.person_name, f.face_encoding FROM Persons p INNER JOIN Faces f ON p.person_id = f.person_id WHERE f.face_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT interaction_id, timestamp, location FROM Interactions WHERE person_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM Alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2021-01-01' AND person_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
